title: Medicine Base
description: Rare drop from Samhain Can be used to create Speedy Concoction (Rank 3 Medicine) Can be used to create Strong Concoction (Rank 3 Medicine) Can be used to create Solid Concoction (Rank 3 Medicine) Even though the item name includes "Medicine", this item is classified as an Ingredient since it cannot be consumed.
